pr_title: #38 - S3 storage support in YAML settings

timeline.message: #38 - S3 storage support in YAML settings

timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz let's add test for unknown credentials type.
timeline.author: Vatavuk

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/test/java/com/artipie/YamlSettingsTest.java b/src/test/java/com/artipie/YamlSettingsTest.java
index bb19175..95b29c0 100644
--- a/src/test/java/com/artipie/YamlSettingsTest.java
+++ b/src/test/java/com/artipie/YamlSettingsTest.java

@@ -75,16 +77,32 @@ class YamlSettingsTest {
     }
 
     @ParameterizedTest
-    @ValueSource(strings = {
-        "",
-        "meta:\n",
-        "meta:\n  storage:\n",
-        "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: unknown\n",
-        "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: fs\n",
-        "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: s3\n"
-    })
+    @MethodSource("badYamls")
     public void shouldFailProvideStorageFromBadYaml(final String yaml) {
         final YamlSettings settings = new YamlSettings(yaml);
         Assertions.assertThrows(RuntimeException.class, settings::storage);
     }
+
+    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnusedPrivateMethod")
+    private static Stream<String> badYamls() {
+        return Stream.of(
+            "",
+            "meta:\n",
+            "meta:\n  storage:\n",
+            "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: unknown\n",
+            "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: fs\n",
+            "meta:\n  storage:\n    type: s3\n",
+            String.join(
+                "",
+                "meta:\n",
+                "  storage:\n",
+                "    type: s3\n",
+                "    bucket: my-bucket\n",
+                "    region: my-region\n",
+                "    endpoint: https://my-s3-provider.com\n",
+                "    credentials:\n",
+                "      type: unknown\n"
+            )
+        );
+    }
 }

timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz let's make it "s3".equals(type), or reverse previous if statement to type.equals("fs") just to be consistent.
